key.name: relays
key.description: List of Nostr relay URLs (ws:// or wss://). Values should be normalized (lowercase scheme/host, no trailing slash) for canonical storage.

key.name: relay-types
key.description: List of relay types corresponding to relays in the same order. Values: "rw" (read+write, default), "r" (read-only), "w" (write-only). Used for NIP-65 relay list metadata (kind 10002).

key.name: relays-window-width
key.description: Last used width for the Relay Manager dialog.

key.name: relays-window-height
key.description: Last used height for the Relay Manager dialog.

key.name: dm-relays
key.description: List of Nostr relay URLs specifically for direct messages (NIP-17). These are the user's "inbox" relays where they receive gift-wrapped DMs. If empty, falls back to regular relays. Published in kind 10050 events.

key.name: current-npub
key.description: The bech32 npub of the active identity. Empty string means not signed in.

key.name: nip46-timeout-ms
key.description: Maximum time to wait for remote signer pairing response before aborting.

key.name: nwc-connection-uri
key.description: NIP-47 Nostr Wallet Connect URI (nostr+walletconnect://...). Contains wallet pubkey, secret, relay URL, and optional lud16. Empty string means no wallet connected.

key.name: blossom-server
key.description: Default Blossom media server URL for file uploads. Used when uploading images, videos, or other media to notes.

key.name: blossom-servers
key.description: List of Blossom media server URLs (kind 10063). The first server in the list is used as the default for uploads.

key.name: video-autoplay
key.description: Whether videos should automatically start playing when they appear in the timeline. When disabled, user must click to start playback.

key.name: video-loop
key.description: Whether videos should loop continuously after reaching the end. When disabled, videos stop at the end of playback.
